thread.title: Thom
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Thom

author: Thom
title: Thom
text: I spent almost my entire working life in the picture framing business, both as employee and owner (40+ years). The concept of "on line" ordering had never even been thought of back then. I find American Frame an outstanding resource for any needs I have today. Their quality, service and INCREDIBLE packing make it an ideal source for folks wanting to assemble their own framing materials. I only wish I had been able to conceptualize that concept in "my day".
